preamble.title: test/generic-dollar-sign-syntax
preamble.description: Test blueprint for alternative generic syntax: Dollar sign notation used by legacy Aiken versions. Some Aiken versions use '$' instead of '<>' for generic type parameters. Both syntaxes must be handled identically.

Option$Int.title: Option
Option$Int.description: Dollar sign syntax for generic instantiation. Equivalent to: Option<Int>. Behavior: Should be SKIPPED (no '<' but contains '$').

List$ByteArray.title: List
List$ByteArray.description: Dollar sign syntax for List generic. Equivalent to: List<ByteArray>. Behavior: Should be SKIPPED.

Option$types/storage/Item.title: Option
Option$types/storage/Item.description: Dollar sign syntax with module path. Equivalent to: Option<types/storage/Item>. Behavior: Should be SKIPPED (generic instantiation). Namespace extraction if called: types/storage/Item to namespace: types.storage

Option$List$types/storage/Item.title: Option
Option$List$types/storage/Item.description: NESTED dollar sign syntax. Equivalent to: Option<List<types/storage/Item>>. Behavior: Should be SKIPPED. Extraction: Recursively extracts types/storage/Item to namespace: types.storage

List$types/storage/Item.title: List
List$types/storage/Item.description: Dollar sign List with module path. Behavior: Should be SKIPPED.

types/storage/Item.title: Item
types/storage/Item.description: CONCRETE TYPE: Storage item. Expected namespace: types.storage. Expected class: com.test.types.storage.Item

types/storage/StorageData.title: StorageData
types/storage/StorageData.description: CONCRETE TYPE: Container using dollar sign generic fields. Storage data with fields using dollar sign generic syntax.
